name: Silky Landings
description:
Spacebar: deploy wings + accelerate ||| WASD: ailerons ||| QE: rudder ||| Backspace: reset

Instructions
Land as smoothly as possible on the floating platforms for the silkiest high score.
Make sure to deploy your wings at the right moment to preserve momentum.
The platforms get pretty small, so you'll have to pull up just right if you want to stick the landing!

Work in progress!
